arts.ttl: Manchester City 4 Borussia Dortmund 1: City player ratings.
arts.sum: The City player ratings reflect how dominant City’s attacking players were and the victory will fill Pep Guardiola’s side with confidence for their upcoming Premier League fixture against Liverpool at the Etihad on Sunday. Here are the City player ratings as Manchester City beat Borussia Dortmund 4-1 at the Etihad tonight in their fourth UEFA Champions League phase fixture.

arts.ttl: Phil Foden scores twice as Man City beat Borussia Dortmund in Champions League
arts.sum: Foden enhanced his claim for an England recall as he struck either side of another Erling Haaland effort.

arts.ttl: Phil Foden’s double downs Borussia Dortmund as Manchester City sparkle
arts.athr: Jamie Jackson at the Etihad Stadium
arts.sum: If Phil Foden performs so do Manchester City is a truism reiterated by this two-goal show that helped sweep Pep Guardiola’s improving team to 10 points from four games at the stage’s halfway juncture. Factor in Erling Haaland who decorated his captaincy for the eve with a 27th goal (for club and country) and Waldemer Anton’s 72nd-minute jab home was solely an irritation. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Man City 4-1 Borussia Dortmund Stats: Foden at the Double as City Sweep Aside Dortmund

arts.ttl: Man City 4-1 Borussia Dortmund: Hosts cruise to win with Phil Foden double and Erling Haaland strike
arts.sum: Phil Foden scores twice and Erling Haaland nets against his former club as Manchester City brush aside Borussia Dortmund to strengthen their position in the group phase of the Champions League.
